https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fBWeLc6Kj8ok0Qsjj98VG91RO4U.jpg During the trial of a man accused of his father's murder, a lone juror takes a stand against the guilty verdict handed down by the others as a result of their preconceptions and prejudices. 12 Angry Men
